outputs.output_descr: Institutional strengthening of the Lao National Unexploded Ordnance Programme (UXO Lao) for 2012-2015, to help manage UXO clearance and risk education programmes in communities at risk more effectively, in support of achieving national development goals including the Lao specific 9th Millennium Development Goal (MDG) on UXO, implementing the national UXO sector strategy "Safe Path Forward II", and fulfilling international treaty obligations under the Convention on Cluster Munitions (CCM).

project_descr: The Lao National Unexploded Ordnance Programme (UXO Lao) is able to effectively manage clearance and risk education programmes in communities at risk in support of achieving national development goals and fulfilling international treaty obligations.
project_title: Support to the UXO Lao Programme (2012-2015)
